Class FacebookDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<login.LoginModel,AccountModel>
        • profile.FacebookDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<login.LoginModel,AccountModel>

    public class FacebookDatabase
extends java.util.HashMap<login.LoginModel,AccountModel>
    Class for holding overall collection of LoginModels and paired AccountModels Extension of HashMap for implementation of JSON-related methods specific to this project
    Author:
    Tim
